title: News24.com | OPINION: Brave health practitioners deserve our honour for their sacrifices to curb the Covid-19
description: In the coming weeks and months, thousands if not millions of healthcare workers will find themselves under more pressure, as they are called upon to help us navigate issues of healthcare access as the virus bites, writes Anna Mokgokong.
content:
